mapper.select: with s as (select start_date date, count(start_date) start_cnt from event where start_date between curdate() and date_add(curdate(), interval 4 day) group by start_date), e as (select end_date date, count(end_date) end_cnt from event where end_date between curdate() and date_add(curdate(), interval 4 day) group by end_date) select s.date as date, ifnull(start_cnt, 0) start_cnt, ifnull(end_cnt, 0) end_cnt from s left join e on s.date = e.date union select e.date as date, ifnull(start_cnt, 0) start_cnt, ifnull(end_cnt, 0) end_cnt from s right join e on s.date = e.date order by date
select c.name name, count(c.name) cnt from event e left join category c on e.category_no = c.category_no where c.name is not null group by c.name order by cnt desc
select date(reg_date) date, count(member_no) cnt from member where date(reg_date) between date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) and curdate() group by date(reg_date) order by date(reg_date)
select e.name, count(e.event_no) cnt from reserve r left join event e on r.event_no = e.event_no where end_date >= curdate() group by e.event_no order by cnt desc limit 5
select e.event_no, e.name, count(e.event_no) cnt from wait w left join event e on w.event_no = e.event_no where end_date >= curdate() group by e.event_no order by cnt desc limit 5
